item.title: VITA
item.description:
Languages:

  • Serbian (mother tongue)
  • English (good)
  • German (basic)

Place of Birth: Ćuprija, Serbia

Residence: Novi Sad, Serbia

Possible accommodation:

  • Paris - Île de France (France)
  • Vienna (Austria)
  • Salzburg (Austria)
  • Zürich (Switzerland)
  • Stockholm (Sweden)
  • Berlin (Germany)
  • London (GB)

Year of Birth: 1991

Height: 182 cm

Eye color: green

Hair color: dark brown

item.title: VITA2
item.description:
Training:

  • graduated drama school (BFA, June 2015) at the Academy of Arts in Novi Sad,Serbia
  • at the moment, studying MFA of acting at the Academy of Arts in Novi Sad, Serbia
  • International ScreenActing Workshop 2016 at the Filmakademie Baden-Wurttemberg, Germany

Vocal pitch: Tenor(well trained)

Skills: acrobatics, physical theatre, fencing, juggling, playing guitar, singing, horse riding, driving car, stage combat, dancing

Workshops:

  • “Michael Chekhov Method” held by Scott Fielding
  • “Roads of Imagination” held by Michel Mathieu
  • “Soundpainting” held by Laurent Rochelle
  • “Shakespeare Workshop” held by Paolo Asso
  • “Circus Skills” held by Mira Beba Dobrković

Award:

TLPA from the foundation “The Little Prince” for achieved excellent results in the field of arts in 2015
